programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: Leo's fidelity is called into question when Grace finds a love letter in his bag, while Jack and Will wake up sharing a bed, but cannot remember the night before. Harry Connick Jr guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: Leo invites his trendy ex-girlfriend to a dinner party. Grace asks Will, Jack and Karen to come along and keep the night running smoothly, but the guest of honour turns out to be the only girl Will ever slept with. Meanwhile, Lorraine's dog is discovered hiding in Stan's closet. Guest starring Mira Sorvino.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Amy chats non-stop through a basketball game, and Ray responds by suggesting to Robert that she talks too much - a criticism she does not take well. Comedy, starring Monica Horan and Ray Romano.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Debra cannot understand why Ray keeps turning down her advances - not realising that playing it cool is all part of his latest devious plan to get what he wants. Comedy, starring Ray Romano.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Alistair Burke, the cultured conductor of the Seattle Opera, becomes convinced Frasier is gay, a misunderstanding the shrink decides to cultivate after his misinformed suitor begins to shower him with gifts. Guest starring Patrick Stewart.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Martin and Frasier vie for the affections of the boys' former babysitter, and the shrink becomes depressed when his father wins her love. Luckily, his ability to solve several mind-twisting problems puts him in a better mood. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and John Mahoney.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Roz persuades Frasier to go on a date with her friend - but the arrangement turns out to be a disaster. Niles and Daphne suspect their maid is dishonest.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Travis Boersma, co-founder and president of one of the largest privately owned drive-through coffee shop chains in America, goes undercover to learn whether the culture he and his brother hoped to implement is being upheld by the company's front-line employees.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Sara Damergi searches the Kissimmee area of Florida to find a holiday home suitable for mother and daughter Jane and Bethan Thomas, who wish to buy a place close by the sunshine state's theme parks that they adore so much. Within their £70,000 budget, the options include a two-bedroom apartment and a three-bedroom lakeside house that offers a promising rental return.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Wiltshire, civil partners Andrew and David serve up a `ritzy' affair for their guests, but their food gets a mixed reaction. On the second night, hosts Emma and Richard face a grilling over their use of shop-bought ingredients. Meanwhile, Richard and Joey's `bromance' develops when they feed each other heart-shaped strawberries. Last to host are newlyweds Joey and Hannah, who serve basic wholesome food, but argue over the size of their fishcakes.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: Nathan and Debb test-drive an unusual motorcycle simulator at Pickwick Pawnbrokers, while Larry and Neil look to complete deals involving a rare drum kit, a luxury set of travel bags and an antique medicine cabinet at Cashbrokers in Penzance.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the words-and-numbers game, featuring historian Suzannah Lipscomb in Dictionary Corner alongside Susie Dent.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Renuka Joseph is looking for a home on the Costa del Sol, which reminds her of her native Sri Lanka, so Jasmine Harman shows her apartments in Estepona for her £80,000 budget.(n)

programme.title: Best of Both Worlds
programme.desc: Property expert Lucy Alexander helps a couple looking to leave London behind and move to Yorkshire, and two people who are longing for peace and privacy in Kent.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Chris and Sarah Whitehead invite their fellow hoteliers to Tenbury Wells in Worcestershire, where they open the doors of their historic pub The Rose and Crown.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Belfast, mobile barista Justin hosts the latest dinner party, hoping his barbecue extravaganza will wow the guests, with even the dessert to be toasted on the coals.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Brazilian football legend Ronaldo visits the town to advise Homer on refereeing Little League matches, while Marge reacts to accusations of technophobia by purchasing a PC - and soon becomes hooked on a game involving a virtual Springfield being terrorised by Bart.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Tom and Alfie cover for Darren, while Armstrong acts as Cindy's protector, and Holly gets a shock when she receives a letter from Jude inviting her and Nick to Ibiza. Holly confides in Ellie and invites her to take Nick's place.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Ackley Bridge
programme.desc: Mandy's personal and professional lives collide with one another when Alya reveals her and Sadiq's affair at the school's first open day. As Mandy fights for her job, but chooses to put her pupils before her career, Steve comes to her rescue. Will it be enough to repair their relationship? Meanwhile, Candice discloses the true identity of Jamie's father, leading Jordan to spiral out of control. Chloe gets caught up in Jordan's plans to leave Ackley Bridge, only for them to fall foul of the police. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 36-year-old man is rushed to St George's after being involved in a high-speed road traffic collision, with CT scans revealing a potentially life-threatening injury to his spleen. Meanwhile, a 21-year-old who dislocated his finger scoring the winning points in a basketball match believes his trip to A&E is the perfect subject for one of his vlogs.(n)

programme.title: The Windsors
programme.desc: Reliving his clubbing heyday, Harry buys a nightclub and asks Kate to be the DJ, while Beatrice and Eugenie work the door. Charles introduces lizards into his garden as pest control, but things get out of hand, and Wills needs to complete his helicopter training.(n)

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Nicki is arrested in connection with Ray's death and is questioned by Chief Dammik, who suspects that she killed him in retaliation for abuse, while Gloria asks Winnie to tell Emmit about his brother and gauge his reaction. Black comedy drama, starring Ewan McGregor and Carrie Coon.(n)

programme.title: Catching a Killer
programme.sub-title: Catching a Killer: The Wind in the Willows Murder.
programme.desc: In April last year, 42-year-old antiquarian book dealer Adrian Greenwood was found dead in his home, having been stabbed more than 30 times in a frenzied and brutal attack - with no suspects, no witnesses and no sign of forced entry. This documentary follows the work of the Thames Valley Police Major Crime Unit as Det Supt Kevin Brown and his team embark on their investigation into who killed Greenwood, as well as find out what happened to the victim's early edition of The Wind in the Willows, worth £50,000.(n)

programme.title: Ramsay's Hotel Hell
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay visits Starkville, Mississippi, to try to rescue the failing Hotel Chester. Despite having more than 40 years' experience in the business, owner David Mollendor is at a loss as to how to make his dream of owning his own hotel work, while his wife Sukie is struggling as its chef, tackling the role without any formal catering experience. Gordon discovers a family tragedy that explains why this couple have become trapped in their business and wrestling with debt.(n)

programme.title: Real, Fake or Unknown
programme.desc: Proving the authenticity of internet animal clips, with videos featuring extreme shepherding in Wales, the tale of a vengeful lion in Africa, and a New Zealand monster mystery.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: The Hi Way elephant family have been hit with a potentially deadly virus affecting animals in captivity and in the wild. With the youngest members of the family most at risk, the keepers and Chester Zoo's veterinary team do all they can to combat the mysterious illness. Meanwhile, Mac the stallion zebra is introduced to the zoo's three mares in the hope they will produce much needed offspring for this endangered species. There's also a look into the bizarre world of the naked mole rat.(n)

programme.title: Inside Out Homes
programme.desc: Zac Monro reinvents a 1930s bungalow on a sought-after estate in Newcastle, a plan that involves removing an entire brick wall and replacing it with glass and decking immediately outside. Monty Ravenscroft builds a fire-pit table to help the owners keep warm while they cook and gardener Rosie Bines creates a scented oasis around the log-fired hot tub.(n)

programme.title: Selling Houses with Amanda Lamb
programme.desc: On the Wirral, Merseyside, Amanda helps three sellers give their respective residences a £1,000 makeover in the hope of impressing potential buyer Keith. Previously seen on More4.(n)

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help two couples looking for somewhere to live in Buckinghamshire, where they can combine high-flying careers in the capital with peaceful small-town life for their young families. Shane and Annamarie Mugan have a budget of £850,000, but have not found their ideal home after viewing more than 50 properties, while Emma and Andrew Jarvis face tough competition as they search for a four-bedroom house with plenty of character.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the words-and-numbers game, featuring historian Suzannah Lipscomb in Dictionary Corner alongside Susie Dent.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: Karen demonstrates fearsome ball skills at her exclusive tennis club when Grace invites Leo to join the game, without asking her friend's permission first. Will ropes Jack into accompanying him on a visit to his depressed mother. Megan Mullally and Harry Connick Jr star.(n)

programme.title: Will & Grace
programme.desc: Jack lands a small part in a Broadway play and makes such a good impression he steals the limelight from the star - renowned actor James Earl Jones, who ends up seeking extra acting tuition from the man himself. Meanwhile, Will and his mother struggle with their living arrangements.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Pat asks Robert to keep her cigarette habit a secret - but he later has to come up with an excuse when Amy smells smoke on him, leading to a string of revelations for the family.(n)

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: In the last-ever episode of the American comedy, Ray has a brush with death while undergoing minor surgery, but pulls through - leaving his family uncertain over whether to tell him what happened.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Martin angrily accuses Frasier of eavesdropping on Ronee's private conversations, while prospective parents Niles and Daphne try to secure the services of Seattle's finest nursery artist. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and John Mahoney.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Part one of two. Niles is shocked when his former wife Maris asks for his help, deciding it is best to keep it a secret from the heavily pregnant and overemotional Daphne. Frasier goes back to private practice, but finds that treating patients face to face is a real test. Guest starring Dan Castellaneta (The Simpsons) and Sarah Silverman.(n)

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Part two of two. Niles is suspected of being an accomplice to murder when his former wife Maris uses his crossbow to kill her husband - and Frasier does not help matters by accidentally suggesting his brother should receive the death penalty.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Eric Casaburi, a former undercover boss, invites six other employers who also appeared incognito on the show to talk about their experiences of the programme at a restaurant. However, little do they realise that Eric is going to try to fool them by appearing as a waiter. Featuring Kat Cole, Paul Damico, Andy Wiederhorn, Sheldon Yellen, Anthony Wedo and Jane Grote Abell.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin helps newlyweds Iris and Alan Ford from Kent, who with a budget of £300,000 are hoping to split their retirement between the UK and the island of Tobago in the Caribbean.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Includes news headlines, sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the first night in Ashford, Kent, francophiles Stephanie and Ian kick of the competition by serving French food from a home emulating the Palace of Versailles. The second night sees city slickers Louise and Dan attempt to secure their lead with spreadsheet organisation, before fun-loving couple Pippa and Lee make a bid for the prize with a mixture of fancy dress, stripping off, wacky voices and homely food.(n)

programme.title: Posh Pawnbrokers
programme.desc: A woman appears at Cashbrokers Pawnbrokers in Penzance with an autograph book signed by stars including the Rolling Stones and Cliff Richard. At Nikolas Patrick in Kent, pawnbroking brothers Charlie and Patrick try to raise cash for a set of vintage cameras and an exclusive designer pen with a sky-high price tag.(n)

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Nick Hewer and Rachel Riley present the words-and-numbers game, featuring historian Suzannah Lipscomb in Dictionary Corner alongside Susie Dent.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Geri Melville and her husband Ian search for a holiday home on the island of St Lucia, where Geri lived until she was nine years old before moving to the UK almost 50 years ago.(n)

programme.title: Best of Both Worlds
programme.desc: Lucy Alexander helps Jane and Rhys move closer to the big-city bustle of Leicestershire while still being near open spaces, and a Tunbridge Wells couple look to downsize.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Lesley and Steve Hawker welcome the contestants to the Woodlands Guest House in Exmoor, but after the bad feedback of previous rounds, it seems their rivals are out for revenge.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Day four in Belfast sees executive assistant Cushla trying to win over her guests with some impressive cuisine, while Steve continues to dominate with his dodgy impressions.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer, Moe, Apu and Principal Skinner become stand-in firefighters, and initially prove surprisingly efficient. Unfortunately, they soon decide the job does not pay well enough, and seek other forms of compensation for their heroic acts - by stealing from houses during emergency calls.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Shane is on to Darren, while Leela worries about Cindy. Dirk gets a call about Liberty, and Scott comes home from hospital.(n)

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather.(n)

programme.title: Who Wants My Council House
programme.desc: Documentary following five households looking to swap their council house. Some want to upgrade to their ideal home, others simply fancy a change of scenery and some are parents seeking to downsize now that their children have flown the nest. However, council house swaps do not involve estate agents with sharp sales patter. It is up to the tenants to show each other around their homes and do the hard sell. If the first viewing goes well, there will be an invitation for a return viewing before both sides decide whether to swap - or not.(n)

programme.title: The Crystal Maze
programme.desc: Maze Master Richard Ayoade guides Andrea McLean, Spencer Matthews, Tom Allen, Stacey Solomon and Joe Swash through the Aztec, Medieval, Industrial and Futuristic zones. In each one, the contestants must conquer physical, skill, mystery and mental challenges in a bid to win crystals, which add to their time inside the Crystal Dome, where they hope to collect gold tokens to convert into cash for the Stand Up to Cancer charity.(n)

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson guides two more singletons on the dating show based naked attraction alone. First into the studio is 26-year-old Adele from Scotland. After beating cancer, Adele wants to live life to the full and find a guy who feels the same. She is followed by 22-year-old Jack from Manchester. After a dramatic four-stone weight-loss, Jack wants to show off his new body and attract the one for him.(n)

programme.title: Real, Fake or Unknown
programme.desc: Proving the authenticity of internet promotional videos, featuring a European video advertising a new extreme sport and a commercial for a jet-powered hoverboard.(n)

programme.title: The Mr Men Show
programme.desc: Mr Fussy tries to keep down his food at Miss Magic's cafe, and Mr Grumpy has trouble ordering at Mr Tickle's restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Mofy
programme.desc: Kerry and Mofy and Kerry are playing in the river when they suddenly hear Lee and Sioux groaning with toothache.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The playgroup organises a sports day featuring lots of events.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: While performing an autopsy for a class of military students, Ducky discovers the cadaver he is using is the body of a murder victim. In trying to identify the corpse, Gibbs and his team are set on the trail of a career criminal specialising in identity fraud. Meanwhile, Ziva has difficulty separating her personal feelings and professional judgment. Starring David McCallum and Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: Rags to Riches: Ultimate Life
programme.desc: Jason Stevens is busy running his grandfather's foundation, while also having to fend off lawsuits from his extended family and lament a fleeing lover. When an inherited journal magically sends him back to 1941, it provides an unparalleled opportunity for him to witness the true rags-to-riches story of his late grandfather. Drama, starring Logan Bartholomew and Peter Fonda.(n)

programme.desc: In Scarborough, the police stop and search a car they suspect may be carrying drugs, but the stakes are raised very quickly when weapons are found, while in a village near Selby, the North Yorkshire road crime team arrests a teenager him for dealing marijuana. In Bradford, traffic cops help the drug squad chase down a class-A drugs dealer, while another team tracks a suspicious character into the toilets of a fast food outlet.(n)

programme.title: The Highland Midwife
programme.desc: In the north of Scotland, Morven closely monitors mum-to-be Emma, who has a history of delivering large babies that require a Caesarean section, while in Campbeltown on the west coast, Susanna gets closer to her dream of a big family as midwife Helen tries to help her have a local birth without pain relief.(n)

programme.title: Extraordinary People
programme.sub-title: The Bubble Wrap Boy: Extraordinary People.
programme.desc: The story of 16-year-old Mithun Chauhan, who suffers from an extremely rare genetic condition that has left him with large swollen lumps all over his face and body. His disfigurement has led to the creation of a rumour that his village has become home to a reclusive monster. The condition, known as neurofibroma, affects one in 33,000 people and causes tumours to grow along the nerve endings, with Mithun's case among the most extreme ever discovered.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.desc: Claimants from across the generations, including a 32-year-old former fisherman and his 20-year-old partner who need a bigger home for their five-strong family, and a 57-year-old former welder now struggling to find permanent employment. Plus, a Hastings woman who, after 10 years on the dole, has started to claim her pension and is living comfortably - and now she has a dream of breaking into the music industry.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers with Alan Davies
programme.desc: The RSPCA are called to the aid of elderly crossbreed Ben. Meanwhile, in Lancashire, a struggling couple must improve their living conditions or face losing their beloved Bichon Frise for good.(n)

programme.title: Now That's Funny
programme.desc: A collection of internet-sourced videos with a family friendly hook, featuring some dating dos and don'ts and a selection of kitchen nightmares. Plus, hilarious horseplay, fishing for kittens and the Stars of the Week.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Alistair Appleton joins interior designer Ann Maurice as she applies her expertise to the task of revamping a three-storey stone cottage in Chippenham, Wiltshire, hoping to increase its sales potential.(n)

programme.title: Great Artists
programme.desc: Tim Marlow examines the work of Italian Renaissance painter Raffaello Santi, known better simply as Raphael, who was born in 1483 and achieved so much in his 37-year life that he was considered equal to Leonardo da Vinci and Michelangelo. He was highly regarded for his many studies of the Madonna and Child, and artists adopted his idealised forms as the model of beauty until the end of the 19th century.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of dedicated volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.desc: Tracy Metro tries to help Birmingham homeowner Omer, whose vocal parrot has put off prospective buyers from bidding for his property.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Kat gets lessons in childcare from Marilyn, John goes on a road trip to his childhood home accompanied by Jet, while Zannis puts further temptation in Brody's way.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Sonya is upset when Mark suggests Toadie might be thinking of moving out, Paige jumps at the chance to work out at The Shed relaunch, while Yashvi learns the gentle art of romance.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy Seal is shot dead while threatening to throw himself from the top of a building. An al-Qaeda operative emerges as the main suspect, but DiNozzo thinks the killer may actually be found closer to home. Elsewhere, a rumour spreads that Abby may be about to leave NCIS for good. Michael Weatherly stars.(n)

programme.title: Stranger in an Amish Town
programme.desc: A penniless stranger and his son turn up on the doorstep of three Amish sisters, who offer him a place to stay and a job as a handyman. The women's police officer niece is suspicious of the new arrival and tries to find out where he has come from. Romantic mystery based on Serena B Miller's novel Love Finds You in Sugarcreek, Ohio, starring Sarah Lancaster, Tom Everett Scott and Kelly McGillis.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Sonya is upset when Mark suggests Toadie might be thinking of moving out, Paige jumps at the chance to work out at The Shed relaunch, while Yashvi learns the gentle art of romance.(n)

programme.desc: Kat gets lessons in childcare from Marilyn, John goes on a road trip to his childhood home accompanied by Jet, while Zannis puts further temptation in Brody's way.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Jim and the team take to the road to spring a trap on suspected drug dealers, while Dan and Gordy track down a man seen roaming the streets armed with two knives. John picks up the pieces of a multicar pile-up, and an early morning raid sees officers break down doors in search of class-A drugs.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.sub-title: Money's Too Tight to Mention: On Benefits.
programme.desc: Catching up with a few familiar faces to find out how their lives have changed. Doncaster man Carl has been living on benefits since a motorcycle accident left him with multiple injuries. Now he has become the drummer in a band for musicians with disabilities. Karen and Paul lost their launderette business and are now rebuilding their home - the only problem is, they believe the house is haunted - and things are looking up for newlyweds Andy and Diane.(n)

programme.title: Circus Kids: Our Secret World
programme.desc: The fly-on-the-wall documentary profiles more youngsters who live for the big top and their moment in the spotlight. Fifteen-year-old Imogene has spent years training as an aerialist and has now been offered the chance of a full-time job in Russell's Circus. But to take it she will have to drop out of school, live alone and cook for herself. It's a big decision but one her parents fully support. Meanwhile, 14-year-old knife-thrower Edward is already earning serious money with his Wild West act.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother's Bit on the Side
programme.desc: Rylan Clark-Neal presents the BB companion show, including celebrity fans' thoughts on the latest developments in the run-up to tomorrow's eviction and behind-the-scenes insights.(n)

programme.title: Chernobyl Diaries
programme.desc: An extreme vacation turns terrifying when a group of friends visit the Chernobyl disaster site, and learn that some nightmares never die. Conceived and produced by Paranormal Activity's Oren Peli, Chernobyl Diaries gets underway as six thrill-seeking tourists hire a fearless tour guide, and travel to the abandoned Ukrainian city of Pripyat. Back when the Chernobyl nuclear reactor was up and running, Pripyat was the place the workers called home. But 25 years after one of the worst power-plant accidents in history, the city serves as an eerily silent testament to the dangers of nuclear power. Later, after getting unexpectedly stranded in Pripyat, the tourists and their guide realize they are being hunted. Now the harder they try to flee, the faster their numbers dwindle until only a few are left standing. Only then will the unspeakable terror that stalks these deserted streets finally emerge from the shadows to launch one last relentless, terrifying attack(n)

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: Tense thriller. Car thief Memphis Raines is forced to steal 50 luxury vehicles in one night in order to save the life of his brother, who has fallen foul of a dangerous crime lord. Once the most successful car thief in California, Raines must reassemble his old gang to fulfil the almost impossible mission. His task is further hampered by a rival band of thieves and the local police(n)

programme.title: Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me
programme.desc: Mike Myers returns as master spy Austin Danger Powers (and, of course, his arch enemy Dr Evil) with a new sidekick in Felicity Shagwell (Heather Graham). Dr Evil has invented a time machine and gone back in time to steal Austin's sexual powers, leaving our hero in 1999 without the ability to perform. Not only does he have to rescue his libido but he must also thwart Dr Evil's plan to devastate Earth with a moon-based laser. With Robert Wagner, Michael York and Seth Green(n)

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, a mysterious, superhuman assassin teams with a young woman to take down a major corporation plotting to use his genetic makeup to create a race of unstoppable killers(n)

programme.title: The Revenant
programme.desc: In this brutal survival tale based on a true story, 19th-century frontiersman Hugh Glass is betrayed and left for dead by his fur-trapping party after he is viciously attacked by a grizzly bear. However, Glass survives and sets out to seek revenge(n)

programme.title: Pale Rider
programme.desc: Atmospheric western about a lone, gun-toting preacher who defends a settlement from attack. In the late 1800s, a young girl witnesses a violent attack on a gold-mining settlement and prays for a miracle to save the camp and its people. Her prayers seem answered when a stranger arrives and helps the prospectors defend themselves. But his real motives are a mystery(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: When a detective's fiancee is kidnapped by an ex-con, he must successfully complete 12 challenges in order to secure her safe release(n)

programme.title: Alien 3
programme.desc: Crash landing on a barren penal-colony planet with an unwelcome visitor in tow, Ripley contends with a group of hardened convicts while using nothing but her wits to battle a terrifying new breed of alien. Although her plan to corner and kill the creature just might work, a horrifying discovery reveals that her fight is far from over(n)

programme.title: The Take
programme.desc: A maverick CIA agent forges an unlikely bond with a pickpocket after the latter is framed for a bombing in Paris. Soon, they combine their brawn and street smarts to investigate a terrorist conspiracy targeting the city's Bastille Day celebrations(n)

programme.title: Die Hard With a Vengeance
programme.desc: Cop John McClane teams with a shop owner to outwit a terrorist who is making him perform a series of dangerous tasks all around Manhattan(n)

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax
programme.desc: A neurologist investigates the case of a young boy who has somehow repeatedly cheated death after the youth survives yet another near-fatal accident on his ninth birthday. As the doctor becomes obsessed with this mystery, he also develops romantic feelings for the boy's mother(n)

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: A drama centred on three people who are haunted by mortality in different ways. George is a blue-collar American who has a special connection to the afterlife. Marie, a French journalist, has a near-death experience that shakes her reality. And when Marcus, a London schoolboy, loses the person closest to him, he desperately needs answers. In search of the truth, their lives will intersect, forever changed by what they believe might or must exist in the hereafter(n)

programme.title: Monster's Ball
programme.desc: Grieving widow Leticia finds solace with lonely prison guard Hank Grotowski. He is mourning the death of his boy Sonny, who shot himself after a row with his dad. What Leticia doesn't know is that Hank supervised the execution of her husband Lawrence. Moving, Oscar-winning drama(n)

programme.title: The Hunted
programme.desc: An American businessman in Japan becomes the quarry of a cult of ninja assassins after he witnesses a woman's murder(n)

programme.title: Cabin Boy
programme.desc: Chris Elliot lends his flat and charmless presence to Adam Resnick's equally flat and charmless Cabin Boy. Elliot plays Nathaniel Mayweather, a simpering, upper-class snob who has just graduated from the Stephenson Finishing School. At the school he has completed all the course work to become an official "fancy lad." He heads after graduation to set sail and take over the charge of his father's hotel in Hawaii. But instead of getting on the luxury liner Queen Catherine, he boards a stinking fishing scow, "The Filthy Whore." The dirty and surly crew refuses to take Nathaniel to Hawaii, so Nathaniel takes matters into his own hands and tries to change the course of the ship. That he does, but instead of Hawaii, he sends the vessel into a bizarre section of the ocean called "Hell's Bucket" --a Ray Harryhausen nightmare spot with walking icebergs, talking cupcakes, laughing clouds, six-armed-women, and giant hardware-store managers. Through all this, Nathaniel develops a romance with a long-distance swimmer, Trina (Melora Walters), that the fishing tug has snagged. The beatific romance comes to a head one night as Nathaniel and Trina stare into the star-lit sky. Trina bares her soul to Nathaniel, after which, Nathaniel responds, "Sorry. I was just thinking how much fun it is to roast pumpkin seeds."(n)

programme.title: O
programme.desc: Modern adaptation of Shakespeare's Othello, transferring the story of jealousy and ambition to an American high school. Odin is the black star of an exclusive prep school, Hugo his envious friend who makes him doubt the fidelity of his girlfriend Desi(n)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: A buttoned-down career woman agrees to let a loopy working-class girl become the surrogate mother of her child(n)

programme.title: Man on the Moon
programme.desc: Jim Carrey does an uncanny and eerie impersonation of quirky actor-comedian Andy Kaufman in this revealing biography directed by Milos Forman. Carrey is a revelation as he slides into Kaufman's most famous and infamous creations: "Tenk you beddy much" Foreign Man, who evolved into Latka on "Taxi"; lounge-singer Tony Clifton; and Andy the Wrestler. Courtney Love, Danny DeVito(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: A divorced boat builder discovers that his preteen son's stepdad is masking an evil side, forcing him to desperately try to protect his ex-wife and son from the new man in their lives in this intense psychological thriller(n)

programme.title: Bachelor Party
programme.desc: Easygoing bus driver Rick is ready to get hitched to wealthy Debbie. But his pals won't let him get away without the messiest stag night of the decade. Raucous comedy(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Ford Fairlane
programme.desc: Controversial and often offensive stand-up comedian Andrew Dice Clay made his debut as a feature film star in this crude comedy. Fairlane is a "rock and roll detective" who works in the music business, has an office on Sunset Boulevard, and drives a 1957 Ford, with clothing to match. He floats through the rock clubs of Hollywood, picking up women and clients, and soon stumbles into a case involving the death of a heavy metal singer, a corrupt music executive (Wayne Newton), the murder of a radio shock-jock (Gilbert Gottfried), and the kidnapping of the jock's daughter (Maddie Corman). Music stars like Sheila E. and Motley Crue singer Vince Neil also have cameos in the film, which attempts to transplant Clay's aggressively obnoxious stage persona into a movie environment(n)

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: New York cop John McClane fights terrorists in an Los Angeles skyscraper in a bid to rescue his estranged wife, who happens to be one of the hostages(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: When four young free divers come upon a legendary shipwreck rumoured to contain millions in gold, they believe their dreams of buried treasure has come true. But nearby on the ocean floor they unearth another, more sinister mystery..(n)

programme.title: Chernobyl Diaries
programme.desc: An extreme vacation turns terrifying when a group of friends visit the Chernobyl disaster site, and learn that some nightmares never die. Conceived and produced by Paranormal Activity's Oren Peli, Chernobyl Diaries gets underway as six thrill-seeking tourists hire a fearless tour guide, and travel to the abandoned Ukrainian city of Pripyat. Back when the Chernobyl nuclear reactor was up and running, Pripyat was the place the workers called home. Now the harder they try to flee, the faster their numbers dwindle until only a few are left standing. Only then will the unspeakable terror that stalks these deserted streets finally emerge from the shadows to launch one last relentless, terrifying attack(n)

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: Science fiction horror. When a spaceship crash lands on an alien world, the crash survivors - including a ruthless killer and the bounty hunter who captured him - face a race against time to escape the planet when they discover the main inhabitants of this world are ravenous nocturnal monsters. With the planet basking in sunlight and the creatures only able to live in darkness, the survivors presume they are safe from harm until they discover that a rare total eclipse is imminent. Their very survival is reliant on them finding a way off the planet(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A mysterious artificial being evolves faster than anticipated, and a corporate consultant is enlisted to determine the test subject's fate(n)

programme.title: Aliens
programme.desc: Ripley awakens 57 years later in this sequel to 1979's "Alien," returning to the space colony where she first encountered a hideous, reptilian creature. The film won Oscars for Sound and Visual Effects(n)

programme.desc: A maverick CIA agent forges an unlikely bond with a pickpocket after the latter is framed for a bombing in Paris. Soon, they combine their brawn and street smarts to investigate a terrorist conspiracy targeting the city's Bastille Day celebrations(n)

programme.title: Die Hard With a Vengeance
programme.desc: Cop John McClane teams with a shop owner to outwit a terrorist who is making him perform a series of dangerous tasks all around Manhattan(n)

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax
programme.desc: A neurologist investigates the case of a young boy who has somehow repeatedly cheated death after the youth survives yet another near-fatal accident on his ninth birthday. As the doctor becomes obsessed with this mystery, he also develops romantic feelings for the boy's mother(n)

programme.title: Hereafter
programme.desc: A drama centred on three people who are haunted by mortality in different ways. George is a blue-collar American who has a special connection to the afterlife. Marie, a French journalist, has a near-death experience that shakes her reality. And when Marcus, a London schoolboy, loses the person closest to him, he desperately needs answers. In search of the truth, their lives will intersect, forever changed by what they believe might or must exist in the hereafter(n)

programme.title: Monster's Ball
programme.desc: Grieving widow Leticia finds solace with lonely prison guard Hank Grotowski. He is mourning the death of his boy Sonny, who shot himself after a row with his dad. What Leticia doesn't know is that Hank supervised the execution of her husband Lawrence. Moving, Oscar-winning drama(n)

programme.title: The Hunted
programme.desc: An American businessman in Japan becomes the quarry of a cult of ninja assassins after he witnesses a woman's murder(n)

programme.title: Cabin Boy
programme.desc: Chris Elliot lends his flat and charmless presence to Adam Resnick's equally flat and charmless Cabin Boy. Elliot plays Nathaniel Mayweather, a simpering, upper-class snob who has just graduated from the Stephenson Finishing School. At the school he has completed all the course work to become an official "fancy lad." He heads after graduation to set sail and take over the charge of his father's hotel in Hawaii. But instead of getting on the luxury liner Queen Catherine, he boards a stinking fishing scow, "The Filthy Whore." The dirty and surly crew refuses to take Nathaniel to Hawaii, so Nathaniel takes matters into his own hands and tries to change the course of the ship. That he does, but instead of Hawaii, he sends the vessel into a bizarre section of the ocean called "Hell's Bucket" --a Ray Harryhausen nightmare spot with walking icebergs, talking cupcakes, laughing clouds, six-armed-women, and giant hardware-store managers. Through all this, Nathaniel develops a romance with a long-distance swimmer, Trina (Melora Walters), that the fishing tug has snagged. The beatific romance comes to a head one night as Nathaniel and Trina stare into the star-lit sky. Trina bares her soul to Nathaniel, after which, Nathaniel responds, "Sorry. I was just thinking how much fun it is to roast pumpkin seeds."(n)

programme.title: O
programme.desc: Modern adaptation of Shakespeare's Othello, transferring the story of jealousy and ambition to an American high school. Odin is the black star of an exclusive prep school, Hugo his envious friend who makes him doubt the fidelity of his girlfriend Desi(n)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: A buttoned-down career woman agrees to let a loopy working-class girl become the surrogate mother of her child(n)

programme.title: Man on the Moon
programme.desc: Jim Carrey does an uncanny and eerie impersonation of quirky actor-comedian Andy Kaufman in this revealing biography directed by Milos Forman. Carrey is a revelation as he slides into Kaufman's most famous and infamous creations: "Tenk you beddy much" Foreign Man, who evolved into Latka on "Taxi"; lounge-singer Tony Clifton; and Andy the Wrestler. Courtney Love, Danny DeVito(n)

programme.title: Domestic Disturbance
programme.desc: A divorced boat builder discovers that his preteen son's stepdad is masking an evil side, forcing him to desperately try to protect his ex-wife and son from the new man in their lives in this intense psychological thriller(n)

programme.title: Bachelor Party
programme.desc: Easygoing bus driver Rick is ready to get hitched to wealthy Debbie. But his pals won't let him get away without the messiest stag night of the decade. Raucous comedy(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Ford Fairlane
programme.desc: Controversial and often offensive stand-up comedian Andrew Dice Clay made his debut as a feature film star in this crude comedy. Fairlane is a "rock and roll detective" who works in the music business, has an office on Sunset Boulevard, and drives a 1957 Ford, with clothing to match. He floats through the rock clubs of Hollywood, picking up women and clients, and soon stumbles into a case involving the death of a heavy metal singer, a corrupt music executive (Wayne Newton), the murder of a radio shock-jock (Gilbert Gottfried), and the kidnapping of the jock's daughter (Maddie Corman). Music stars like Sheila E. and Motley Crue singer Vince Neil also have cameos in the film, which attempts to transplant Clay's aggressively obnoxious stage persona into a movie environment(n)

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: New York cop John McClane fights terrorists in an Los Angeles skyscraper in a bid to rescue his estranged wife, who happens to be one of the hostages(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: When four young free divers come upon a legendary shipwreck rumoured to contain millions in gold, they believe their dreams of buried treasure has come true. But nearby on the ocean floor they unearth another, more sinister mystery..(n)

programme.title: Chernobyl Diaries
programme.desc: An extreme vacation turns terrifying when a group of friends visit the Chernobyl disaster site, and learn that some nightmares never die. Conceived and produced by Paranormal Activity's Oren Peli, Chernobyl Diaries gets underway as six thrill-seeking tourists hire a fearless tour guide, and travel to the abandoned Ukrainian city of Pripyat. Back when the Chernobyl nuclear reactor was up and running, Pripyat was the place the workers called home. But 25 years after one of the worst power-plant accidents in history, the city serves as an eerily silent testament to the dangers of nuclear power. Later, after getting unexpectedly stranded in Pripyat, the tourists and their guide realize they are being hunted. Now the harder they try to flee, the faster their numbers dwindle until only a few are left standing. Only then will the unspeakable terror that stalks these deserted streets finally emerge from the shadows to launch one last relentless, terrifying attack(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip

programme.title: Made in Chelsea

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.sub-title: What Happens in Jersey - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Joe's dying grandmother begs him to come and visit one last time on her birthday, and to bring his wife Tiffany along. He had failed to tell his family about the divorce, so Mel is forced to take a road trip to New Jersey and pose as his ex-wife at the party. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.sub-title: What Happens in Jersey - Part Two.

He had failed to tell his family about the divorce, so Mel is forced to take a road trip to New Jersey to pose as his ex-wife at the party. Family comedy, starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Tucker's latest failed relationship prompts him to focus on the one that got away - his college girlfriend Olivia. In an effort to cheer their friend up, Ben and Danny track Olivia down in the hope of reuniting the lovebirds, but when Tucker meets Olivia he gets a big surprise. Elsewhere, ambitious Riley gets into trouble when she overuses her corporate credit card to network and pull in new clients.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.sub-title: An Officer and a Gentle Ben.

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: A visitor at the hotel intentionally stirs up trouble between Lily and Robin, and also between Ted and Barney. Meanwhile, Marshall and baby Marvin finally arrive at the Farhampton Inn to join the wedding party. American sitcom, guest starring Andrew Rannells.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Marshall tells the gang about his quest to learn the three mighty virtues of speed, strength and accuracy to master the Slap of a Million Exploding Suns - before delivering a devastating blow to Barney. American sitcom, guest starring Boyz II Men.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Julia tells Nick she does not want to put a label on their relationship, leaving him anxious and disappointed, and she also annoys Jess by refusing to help her get out of paying for a parking ticket. programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess decides to mark her first Valentine's Day as a single woman by going on a meaningless date with a stranger and asks Schmidt to help her find a suitable candidate. Guest starring Ryan Kwanten (True Blood) and Clark Duke (Hot Tub Time Machine).(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Part one of two. Ted says his goodbyes to the gang after Barney and Robin's wedding day, and prepares for his new life in Chicago. However, he has a fateful encounter with someone at Farhampton railway station. American sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Part two of two. In the last-ever episode of the comedy, the friends reunite for Ted's wedding, having seen less of one another recently due to their changing circumstances. Meanwhile, a monumental event in Barney's personal life leads him to change his ways. Starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess is lacking direction after being fired from her teaching job and agrees to act as a `shot girl' at a party thrown by Schmidt. programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess encounters a handsome stranger who is waiting to meet a woman he befriended on the internet, so she decides to pretend to be his date. programme.sub-title: And the Partnership Hits the Fan.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard face problems when they file for a patent for their infinite persistence gyroscope. Plus, Penny, Amy and Bernadette give Raj dating advice when Emily reaches out to him after their breakup. Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco star.(n)

programme.desc: Amy is shocked at a revelation from Sheldon after she buys him a new laptop, while Raj sells out Leonard and Howard after they lie to their wives in order to attend an early screening of a movie. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.desc: Mel is excited about the prospect of spending Christmas with her sister Meredith, who is on a home visit from prison. Guest starring Jaime Pressly (My Name Is Earl).(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Joe plans to admit his feelings for Mel after their romantic night in New Jersey, but is stopped when he finds out her ex-boyfriend Austin wants to give the relationship a second chance. Meanwhile, Ryder makes himself sick through his own cooking.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Ben panics when he realises he has forgotten his mother's birthday once again, and enlists the guys to help organise an impromptu celebration. Comedy, starring Jean-Luc Bilodeau.(n)

programme.sub-title: You Give Real Estate a Bad Name.

Danny is happily dating his new girlfriend Robyn, but is disturbed to realise that she seems to have more in common with Ben.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Marshall and Lily decide to put their argument about Marshall accepting a judgeship without discussing it on hold so they can enjoy their reunion. Meanwhile, Robin and Ted finally discover what Barney does for a living when they cross-examine him after he has had too much to drink. American sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother

The couple realise they have had many of the same friends and acquaintances over the years. American sitcom, starring Josh Radnor and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess tries to stop one of her pupils picking on a classmate - only to become the new target of the bully's wrath. Schmidt is desperate to brag about his Valentine's Day exploits, but finds his partner is far less keen, while Nick is plunged into despair by a gift from Julia.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Nick injures his back during a game of touch football, so Jess takes him to see a doctor. However, an initial scan reveals a potentially serious problem, forcing him to take stock of his life. His friends, meanwhile, are unsure what they can do to help.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: While investigating a serial killer, Peralta enlists Holt's help in an attempt to solve the case without the new captain finding out. programme.title: How I Met Your Mother

programme.title: SEC Storied

programme.title: SEC Storied

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: Wild Japan
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the wildlife of rural Japan's mountains, rainforests, beaches and swamps - including bears, raccoons and fiddler crabs.(n)

programme.title: Infestation
programme.desc: The documentary focuses on the invasive species and pests that threaten forests, including the Asian long-horned beetle and the emerald ash borer, which have wiped out billions of trees in the USA. Across the border into Canada, the mountain pine beetle has halved the number of lodgepole pines, and the kissing bug, a carrier for Chagas disease, ticks and the Burmese python are also damaging woodland.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: On New Zealand's North Island, the actor joins record-breaking fisherman Geoff Stone to hunt for hapuka. He then celebrates his birthday with Maori people, enjoying a feast of mussels caught on the Waitangi River. Finally, Robson travels to Motiti Island's Bay of Plenty, where he takes part in a nerve-racking free-dive to snatch crayfish from waters teeming with jellyfish.(n)

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.sub-title: To the Ends of the Earth.
programme.desc: David Attenborough travels to the Arctic and Antarctic to explore the wildernesses at Earth's poles, investigating the wildlife and geographical features found there. He begins by travelling to the North Pole, where two polar bears reveal a surprisingly tender side to their characters, before heading to the South Pole - 100 years after Roald Amundsen and Robert Falcon Scott first reached it.(n)

programme.title: Wild Japan
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the wildlife of rural Japan's mountains, rainforests, beaches and swamps - including bears, raccoons and fiddler crabs.(n)

programme.title: Wild Caribbean
programme.desc: The coral and shipwrecks found off the shores of the tropical islands, and how the different kinds of reef have given rise to a huge diversity of underwater life in the area. Underwater time-lapse photography also shows how carnivorous corals feed at night and how, over a few nights of the year, they disperse their sperm and eggs.(n)

programme.title: Inside the Animal Mind
programme.desc: Chris Packham continues his exploration of the minds of the cleverest animals on the planet by examining the problem-solving abilities of crows. He also investigates the extraordinary range of animal intelligence, examining bees that navigate, cockatoos that can pick locks and an ingenious octopus.(n)

programme.title: Wild Ones
programme.desc: The behaviour of the some of the planet's biggest animals, featuring the elephant, hippo, giraffe, and at sea the humpback whale.(n)

programme.title: Wild Japan
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the wildlife of rural Japan's mountains, rainforests, beaches and swamps - including bears, raccoons and fiddler crabs.(n)

programme.title: Infestation
programme.desc: The documentary examines the invasive species and pests that threaten cities, including bed bugs, termites, cockroaches, rats, mosquitos and coyotes. Cockroaches produce high amounts of allergens and are one of the causes of asthma for children in conurbations. In the USA, coyotes have begun to feed on pets and livestock and can now reach weights of 75 pounds, while in the southern states, mosquitoes have started to spread the West Nile virus. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green
programme.desc: In Australia, the actor fishes for barramundi in the waters of Carmor Plains Wildlife Reserve, where the inhabitants include crocodiles. He then learns how to catch milkfish using a loaf of bread in Darwin and visits the Great Barrier Reef. Finally, he tries to master the technique of `surface popping' so that he can hunt for trevally, a predator with a voracious appetite.(n)

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: A polar bear hunts with her cubs, while the warmer weather of spring accelerates a process that will eventually see an area of ice the size of Australia disappear into the Arctic Ocean. A woolly bear caterpillar emerges from the snow after spending the winter frozen, and in Antarctica male Adelie penguins arrive to begin constructing nests in fierce storms as they try to attract mates.(n)

programme.title: Wild Japan
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the wildlife of rural Japan's mountains, rainforests, beaches and swamps - including bears, raccoons and fiddler crabs.(n)

programme.title: Wild Caribbean
programme.desc: The effects of the region's powerful hurricanes on the islands' wildlife and the survival stories of some of the species, including how the Puerto Rican parrot almost became extinct. Offshore, lobsters head to deeper waters for refuge, while reefs benefit from the destruction.(n)

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas

programme.desc: Young Olive is given a shot at the Little Miss Sunshine beauty pageant in California and manages to coerce her family into driving west in their worn-down VW van(n)

programme.title: The Ghost and the Darkness
programme.desc: Michael Douglas and Val Kilmer team up for this terrifying tale about a pair of lions which terrorised the African plains in the late 1800s. John Patterson (Kilmer) is an engineer trying to construct a series of bridges in East Africa to support the forthcoming railway line. When construction on the project is halted by the rumours of two 'Devils of the Night' - a couple of staggeringly devious lions nicknamed ' The Ghost' and 'The Darkness' - Patterson knows that he must have the creatures killed. Joining forces with wild game hunter Remington (Douglas), Patterson attempts to outwit the lions - but they are far cleverer than either man could ever have imagined(n)

programme.title: Idiocracy
programme.desc: A comedy about a soldier who awakens in a world filled with dumb people after becoming involved in a futuristic experiment(n)

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: Fantastical adventure starring Eddie Murphy as the unlikely social worker who is given the task of protecting a magical child from those who seek to control the universe(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: In 'Brooklyn's Finest', we're taken on a dark ride through the streets of Brooklyn, following three New York Police officers as they wrestle with temptation while attempting to uphold the law and deal with the pressures of the job. Eddie (Richard Gere) is a bitter and disillusioned veteran cop who's a week away from retirement. Tango (Don Cheadle) is an undercover narcotics cop who tries desperately to leave the streets and earn a promotion to a desk job. Much like Eddie, he's lost sight of his priorities and his loyalties seem to lie more with notorious inner-city drug dealer Caz (Wesley Snipes) than with the boys in blue. At the same time, narcotics detective Sal is a family man in despair and needs to raise money to buy a better house for his family. In seven days, the lives of all three officers will converge at one crime scene(n)

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: "Titanic" stars Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet reunite for this incisive adaptation of Richard Yates's acclaimed novel about a 1950s suburban couple who become frustrated with their lives and struggle to find fulfillment(n)

programme.title: Friday After Next
programme.desc: The gang from Friday and Next Friday are back in this urban comedy, in which Craig (Ice Cube) and Day-Day (Mike Epps) have finally moved out of their respective parents' homes and gotten an apartment together. However, a bogus neighborhood Santa Claus (Rickey Smiley) decides to help Craig and Day-Day share the wealth by robbing their apartment, and when he rips off their stereo, he also makes off with their rent money, which was hidden in the speaker cabinets. Desperate to make rent and have some money for Christmas presents, Craig and Day-Day land jobs at a local strip mall, where their fathers, Mr. Jones (John Witherspoon) and Uncle Elroy (Don "D.C." Curry), have gone into business together running a barbecue joint. Craig and Day-Day are installed as security guards, and while Craig tries to make time with Donna (K.D. Aubert), a saleswoman at the Pimp N' Ho's Boutique, and keep things orderly at Holy Moly's Doughnut Shop, Day-Day attempts to transform himself into a master of crime-fighting, which causes a lot more problems than it solves. Friday After Next is the first feature film from director Marcus Raboy, who previously directed music videos for Sting, Li'l Kim, Staind, and Friday After Next star Ice Cube(n)

programme.desc: A security guard and his best friend scheme to rob an armored-car company, but a determined cop is hot on their tail(n)

programme.title: Dead Heist
programme.desc: This nerve-wracking chiller is about a crime-boss's bodyguard (D.J. Naylor) who must pull off one last bank job before he can get out of the business. When the caper goes awry, the robbers and their hostages find themselves trapped by mutant zombies who've escaped from an government institution where they were part of a military experiment. Luckily for those barricaded in the bank, a government official (Big Daddy Kane), who worked on the botched tests, comes to the rescue. For some of them(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II
programme.desc: Paul Hogan tangles with drug lords to free his kidnapped girlfriend (Linda Kozlowski). Walter: John Meillon. LeRoy: Charles Dutton. Charlie: Ernie Dingo. Donk: Steve Rackman. Brannigan: Kenneth Welsh. Tanner: Dennis Boutsikaris(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: Beatrix Kiddo aka "The Bride" was once part of a group of elite, top class female assassins, until the group leader, "Bill", and the other assassins turn against her and leave her for dead. Five years later "The Bride" wakes up from the coma the assassins left her in and begins her quest for vengeance. She works her way down the list of her ex-colleagues leaving her boss Bill for last. Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned…(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: Vengeful assassin The Bride is back to settle old scores with three more adversaries: Elle, Budd and Bill, the man she once loved. Thriller(n)

programme.title: On the Edge
programme.desc: A teenager finds himself reaching out to others as he tries to heal his emotional wounds in this drama. Jonathan (Cillian Murphy) is a young man who is having a difficult time coming to terms with the recent death of his father; after falling into a deep depression, he attempts to commit suicide by driving a car off an embankment. Jonathan survives the accident and is sent to a mental institution for treatment. While in the hospital, Jonathan becomes friendly with a disturbed youngster named Toby (Jonathan Jackson), and falls in love with Rachel (Tricia Vessey), another patient at the facility. Also featuring Stephen Rea, On the Edge was the third feature from Irish director John Carney and the first to be backed by a major American studio(n)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II

programme.title: The Big Boss
programme.desc: A man is sent from his rural home to work in a tough ice factory. He has sworn an oath to avoid violence, but a series of sinister events tests his character. He soon discovers his boss is embroiled in underworld dealings with dastardly heroin smugglers - and sets out to deliver his own brand of justice(n)

programme.desc: A superhero-rock star-scientist must protect his new invention, which is being sought by thieving space invaders, who want to use it to take over the world(n)

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: After finding herself stuck on an out-of-control bus in the first movie, Sandra Bullock's feisty heroine Annie returns for a new adventure. Annie thinks her new boyfriend, Alex (Jason Patric), is a policeman and she wants him to stop putting his life in danger. What Alex hasn't told her is that he's actually a SWAT team member, which means he's engaged in some of the most dangerous activities imaginable! When Annie finds out the truth, Alex decides to apologise by taking her on a romantic cruise. But fate conspires to ruin their holiday when disgruntled ex-employee Geiger (Willem Dafoe) decides to forego an industrial tribunal in favour of blowing up the boat owned by the company which fired him! As the now out-of-control cruise ship hurtles towards potential destruction and Annie gets herself into a series of risky scrapes, Alex dangles, dives, swings and leaps his way around the ship, rescuing passengers in distress and desperately searching for a way to prevent his romantic cruise from having an explosive ending(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.sub-title: Mr Monk Gets Stuck in Traffic.
programme.desc: An environmental activist is murdered by a building contractor who tries to make his death look like a tragic car accident. Fortunately, Adrian gets stuck in the ensuing tailback, and solves the case while waiting for the road to reopen. Detective drama, guest starring Larry Miller (10 Things I Hate About You) and featuring cameo appearances by members of the rock band Korn.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A woman looks set to be convicted of murdering her dance teacher, but Jane believes she is innocent after watching her give a press conference. He tries to prove she is not the killer before the jury's verdict is read out in court - so he announces that footage has been found of the crime taking place and waits to see who takes the bait. Crime drama, guest starring Ian Kahn, Diane Farr and James Frain, with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A woman convicted of murdering her husband is given permission to leave jail for a few days to help Jane track down a former charity worker's killer, and they learn the philanthropist the victim once worked for is not as benevolent as he seems. However, as the case progresses, the consultant's new partner uses her charms to try to fool him and make a bid for her freedom. Crime drama, guest starring Morena Baccarin (Homeland), with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A man who wanted to expose the killer of the Visualise cult co-founder is murdered, leading the team to investigate old adversary Bret Stiles, who was photographed wearing a bloodied suit. As the sect's inner circle meets to elect a new leader, Jane hopes spreading a rumour will help him catch the culprit - but when nobody takes the bait, he has to change his tactics. Crime drama, guest starring Malcolm McDowell, with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and the team examine the murder of a Shakespeare enthusiast and become suspicious of the victim's billionaire employer when he announces a $10million reward for information about the case, despite having a reputation for frugality. Meanwhile, FBI agent Susan Darcy enlists Jane's help to investigate the killing of a woman whose body was found in woods, and their only clue is a piece of glass from a wine bottle. Crime drama, starring Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The body of a woman is found in Provenza's garage, forcing Brenda to become involved in a cover-up of her own. The detective struggles to protect members of her team, who find themselves racing against the clock before the LAPD finds out what they are up to. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick and GW Bailey.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the death of a paparazzo, who appears to have killed himself by jumping out of a hotel window. They discover a popular celebrity may have been the target of the photographer's prying camera. Meanwhile, calls from a female colleague to Fritz stir up feelings of jealousy in Brenda. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The dismembered body parts of an adult-film star are found in a skip, prompting Brenda and the team to look for more clues to solve the puzzle. However, once they begin gathering the evidence, the suspect list gets increasingly longer. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda and the team try to solve the case of a mother and daughter whose drowned bodies have been found by fishermen. As events proceed, a surprising revelation helps them unravel the mystery. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. Gibbs joins forces with the FBI when the body of a congressman and former agent washes ashore in New Orleans. Together they try to determine if the murder could be linked to a well-known case the victim had previously worked on during his career. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. DiNozzo, McGee and the FBI continue to track political connections to a case, and Bishop sends DiNozzo a souvenir. Meanwhile, Gibbs and Special Agent Pride chase leads in New Orleans after evidence points to a copycat killer. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Pauley Perrette and Scott Bakula.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: McGee's girlfriend Delilah makes a breakthrough in a case involving the alleged death of a US navy lieutentant. However, when her boss orders her to back away, she turns to the NCIS team for help. Meanwhile, McGee talks to DiNozzo about whether he should move forward with his relationship. Crime drama, starring Sean Murray.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team must ascertain whether the murder of a Navy officer, whose body was found on a rural road, was the result of a bar fight or because he knew too much about an attack on a fellow female officer. Meanwhile, DiNozzo and McGee begin a juice detox to purge their bodies of impurities. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine sergeant falls to her death from a building, and when Gibbs and his team examine the circumstances, the woman's doctor urges him to consider this a murder investigation.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: The team tackles jury bias against a woman on trial for the murder of a star athlete, who she previously accused of assaulting her. Meanwhile, Benny encounters an old flame.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois shows Meg how to have fun during a spring break at the beach, while Peter rashly takes out a loan and buys a boat, determined to try his hand at commercial fishing.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: The Griffins visit Lois's pregnant sister and help deliver her baby, who catches them off guard by putting in a premature appearance. Exhilarated, they decide to try for another child of their own - but Stewie is horrified and tries every trick in the book to prevent conception.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve suffers from back trouble and is forced to wear an unsightly brace. He refuses to attend school - until he discovers Stan has an embarrassing problem of his own. Meanwhile, Roger sneaks Hayley into a high-end spa, securing the attentions of an in-house detective.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan is given pills by a colleague that enable him to stay awake all night so he can spend more time enjoying his hobbies, but when Francine discovers his nocturnal activities, she wants to join him. Meanwhile, Steve and Roger try to write a script for a pornographic film.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter is struck by lightning and hovers on the brink of death. In his state of limbo he experiences flashbacks that make him realise he should pay more attention to his beloved wife. At the same time, he agrees to arrange a date for Death with the girl from the pet shop. Peter Frampton guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Lois becomes a martial arts expert and puts her new-found skills to use by chasing away tourists watching the leaves fall in Quahog. Unfortunately her zeal for combat soon infects the entire Griffin household, leading to an all-out family brawl.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan becomes jealous when he discovers Francine was once engaged to a pilot whose plane crashed. However, it emerges his wife's would-be husband survived the incident, and the envious spy enlists Roger's help to track him down.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve dons a mask and takes revenge on the popular girls at his school for humiliating his girlfriend Debbie. When his identity is exposed, he is forced to flee from an angry mob along with his friends. With the guest voice of Lizzy Caplan.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: The Kiss Seen Around the World.
programme.desc: Meg lands a job at the local TV station, only to suffer the humiliation of having her first kiss broadcast to hordes of viewers. Meanwhile, Stewie plots an appropriate revenge on the miscreant who stole his tricycle.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter loses his job and decides to pursue his lifelong dream of becoming a knight at a travelling Renaissance fair. Unfortunately, he finds himself locked in a tournament with the resident jousting champion. With the guest voice of Will Ferrell.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Hayley splits up with her boyfriend Jeff and ends up falling for Stan's CIA body double, who in turn starts flirting with Francine. Meanwhile, Steve rescues chickens from a slurry factory. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Scott Grimes.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger suggests Stan hold a telethon to replace money lost in CIA budget cuts, but the spy takes all the credit for the idea, prompting his alien lodger to sabotage the event.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Stottlemeyer solves a murder while drunk, but cannot remember the solution once he has sobered up. Adrian visits Las Vegas to help jog his memory, and wins a fortune at the blackjack tables, where his condition enables him to remember every card in a 10-pack game. James Brolin (The Amityville Horror) guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A man who wanted to expose the killer of the Visualise cult co-founder is murdered, leading the team to investigate old adversary Bret Stiles, who was photographed wearing a bloodied suit. As the sect's inner circle meets to elect a new leader, Jane hopes spreading a rumour will help him catch the culprit - but when nobody takes the bait, he has to change his tactics. Crime drama, guest starring Malcolm McDowell, with Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Lisbon and the team examine the murder of a Shakespeare enthusiast and become suspicious of the victim's billionaire employer when he announces a $10million reward for information about the case, despite having a reputation for frugality. Meanwhile, FBI agent Susan Darcy enlists Jane's help to investigate the killing of a woman whose body was found in woods, and their only clue is a piece of glass from a wine bottle. Crime drama, starring Robin Tunney and Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A wealthy man who had cancer is found murdered, despite only having weeks left to live, leaving the team suspecting one of his relatives could be to blame. Jane discovers his son was being cut out of the will and his wife was pretending to be ill in a con to win the affections of rich men. He is also led to a charlatan healer selling a special kind of tea after noticing an unusual smell on the body. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A casino security guard is killed and the team investigates his place of work, leading Jane to meet a magician he used to work with. He discovers his former colleague is planning to rob the business because his girlfriend has been kidnapped, and sets up a daring robbery as part of a live show in the hope of learning the murderer's identity. Crime drama, guest starring Christopher Judge, with Simon Baker and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The dismembered body parts of an adult-film star are found in a skip, prompting Brenda and the team to look for more clues to solve the puzzle. However, once they begin gathering the evidence, the suspect list gets increasingly longer. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: Brenda and the team try to solve the case of a mother and daughter whose drowned bodies have been found by fishermen. As events proceed, a surprising revelation helps them unravel the mystery. Kyra Sedgwick stars.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A boy blames himself for the death of his friend, forcing Brenda to tread lightly to get to the bottom of the case. To make matters worse, the deceased child's mother makes accusations of her own. Detective drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: The detectives deal with a case of mistaken identity, which is hampering a major investigation. Meanwhile, Brenda is called to testify in Pope's divorce settlement, but finds that both her career and reputation are at risk. Drama, starring Kyra Sedgwick.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: McGee's girlfriend Delilah makes a breakthrough in a case involving the alleged death of a US navy lieutentant. However, when her boss orders her to back away, she turns to the NCIS team for help. Meanwhile, McGee talks to DiNozzo about whether he should move forward with his relationship. Crime drama, starring Sean Murray.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team must ascertain whether the murder of a Navy officer, whose body was found on a rural road, was the result of a bar fight or because he knew too much about an attack on a fellow female officer. Meanwhile, DiNozzo and McGee begin a juice detox to purge their bodies of impurities. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo and Pauley Perrette.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the disappearance of photographer Martin Roe, who was due to testify at an army first lieutenant's court-martial after he captured a picture of what appeared to be a soldier killing an unarmed civilian. However, the photograph is leaked, and Roe is later found dead with a needle in his arm.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Director Vance charges DiNozzo with a special assignment to go to France, locate Admiral Kendall's wayward daughter Amanda and bring her home. Arriving in Marseille, Tony immediately heads to the local NCIS office, only to find five dead agents. After eventually tracking down Amanda, the pair embark on a rollercoaster ride to the relative safety of the nearest NCIS office in Spain. Michael Weatherly stars.(n)

programme.desc: Peter and Lois go into business together, opening a cookie store. However, tensions rise when Peter devises his own way of attracting more customers. Adult animation, featuring the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Alex Borstein.(n)
